results.name: Running From The End Of Time

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GT1030
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
  • Additional Notes: M1 Silicon Supported
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Monterey
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GT1030
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
  • Additional Notes: M1 Silicon Supported
